name: Bitcoin Knots VM
short_description: Bitcoin full node with enhanced features and privacy focus.
description: Bitcoin full node with enhanced features and privacy focus. Bitcoin Knots VM is a self-hosted application focused on cryptocurrency, bitcoin, crypto, blockchain. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Bitcoin Knots VM on your home server to bitcoin full node with enhanced features and privacy focus without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Bitcoin Knots VM to manage your cryptocurrency workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
